title: Blinding Lights
description: A catchy, retro-inspired synthwave track that became a global hit, blending modern pop with 80s nostalgia.

title: Levitating
description: A vibrant, feel-good pop track with an upbeat, danceable groove that showcases Dua Lipa's signature style.

title: Watermelon Sugar
description: A summery, upbeat pop song that evokes feelings of nostalgia and carefree joy, often associated with hot summer days.

title: Good 4 U Test
description: A pop-punk anthem that mixes raw emotion with energetic guitar riffs, capturing the angst and frustration of a breakup.

title: Peaches
description: A smooth, laid-back R&B track with a feel-good vibe, featuring collaborations with Daniel Caesar and Giveon.

title: Save Your Tears
description: A synth-heavy track that deals with heartbreak, featuring emotional lyrics with a catchy, upbeat melody.

title: Kiss Me More
description: A smooth, funky pop song with a catchy melody, blending elements of R&B and hip-hop with a playful vibe.

title: Montero (Call Me By Your Name)
description: A bold, genre-defying anthem that tackles themes of self-expression, confidence, and personal liberation.

title: Positions
description: A romantic pop song with a smooth, sultry vibe, showcasing Ariana Grande's vocal range and versatility.

title: Blinding Lights (Remix)
description: A remix of 'Blinding Lights' featuring Rosalía, with an added Latin influence and an extended instrumental section.
